entries.name: Willie K. Goode
entries.title: Founder & CEO
entries.bio: After starting out on the back of a truck, the CEO of Goode Companies, Inc. has grown a multi-company portfolio.

entries.name: Willie D. Goode
entries.title: Chief Operating Officer
entries.bio: At 27, Willie successfully led GCI's expansion into Baltimore as VP of Roll-off/Commercial Operations, increasing revenues year over year.
